oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from consolidation interview with Rebecca Thomas, November 28, 1994
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an interview with Rebecca Thomas, conducted on November 28, 1994 by Carole Bucy as part of the Metro Consolidation Oral History Interviews. Thomas discusses her role in the consolidation of the city and county governments. He also comments briefly on other individuals and their contributions. The record is of poor quality and is difficult to understand. The complete record of the interview is available at the Metro Government Archives.
